thread.title: BRIEF-Marimekko ‍Q4 Operating Profit Up By 35 Percent Yoy​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Marimekko ‍Q4 Operating Profit Up By 35 Percent Yoy​
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Marimekko Oyj:
* Q4 NET SALES EUR 29.8 MILLION VERSUS EUR 28.2 MILLION YEAR AGO
* ‍Q4 OPERATING PROFIT GREW BY 35 PERCENT ON SAME PERIOD IN PREVIOUS YEAR AND WAS EUR 2.4 MILLION (1.8).​
* ‍WILL PROPOSE TO ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING THAT A DIVIDEND OF EUR 0.50 PER SHARE BE PAID FOR 2017.​
* NET SALES AND COMPARABLE OPERATING PROFIT FOR 2018 ARE FORECAST TO BE AT SAME LEVEL AS OR HIGHER THAN IN PREVIOUS YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
